title: 2002 Math OSP, Number 16
body: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"What is the remainder of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"{ 43 }^{ { 43 }^{ 43 } }"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" divided by 100 ?"}]}]}

title: 2002 Math OSP, Number 17
body: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"4 pairs of husbands and wifes buy tickets for 8 seats in the same row in a show. 2 people will sit next to each other only if the two are pairs of husband and wife or have the same gender. How many ways are there to put these 4 pairs of husbands and wifes onto those 8 seats?"}]}]}

title: 2002 Math OSP, Number 18
body: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"How many 4-digit numbers in the form "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\\overline { abcd } "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" with "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a\\le b\\le c\\le d"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]}]}

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Choose 4 numbers from the set "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\left\{1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8,9,ab,bc,cd\right\}"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}},{"type":"text","text":"
where [ab] denotes b=a, [bc] denotes c=b, [cd] denotes d=c."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"There are "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\left(\begin{array}{c}12\\ 4\end{array}\right)"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}},{"type":"text","text":" = 495 ways to do so."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}
